extendedInfo.description: Mr. Smiley's having a tough time.Depressing thoughts keep getting him down :(Help him fight sadness and depression with happiness and laughter :) Do you have quick enough reactions?Use the slingshot to sling your Mini Smiley at the bad thoughts trying to attack from above!Score extra points by hitting multiple enemies and scoring combos. Tap to lock in the combo.Hit the UFO to destroy all enemies for a points boost!Hit a Power-up crate to give your smiley extra powers.Enemy speed and numbers slowly increase with time.Don't let Mr. Smiley cry!FREE FOR A LIMITED TIME! :)NEW: ScoreLoop is now Integrated, for Global High Scores!Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/SmileySlingerFollow us on Twitter for Updates: http://twitter.com/#!/TangelloFellowThanks Reddit and dr_chunks ;)

reviews.title: Great game..
reviews.comment: Needs further development for tab support.. will be back bgm doesn\'t work on xoom
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bleerin whopser
reviews.comment: Ah here now this game is top quality. You\'ll not find a better game on the market. Gud valu 4 money

reviews.comment: What a simple sounding game.........but it\'s not. Lots of fun and challenging. HTC Sensation 4G

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Awesome little game. really addictive. good time killer. Runs great on Desire Z!
